nodes.text: The Hetzalian government was the controlling entity of the Hetzal system. Affiliated with the larger Galactic Republic, the Hetzal system's government was headed by an individual who held the title of Minister. The government also had a security division, Counselors who advised the minister, and a Ministry of Technology. At the time of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, the Hetzalian government was led by Minister Zeffren Ecka.
